name: Commlink
description: A basic personal communication device, like a cellphone or short-range radio.

name: Computer (Basic)
description: Provides access to information networks, data storage, and basic software.

name: GPS Receiver
description: Global Positioning System receiver, shows location and aids navigation.

name: Handcuffs (Steel)
effects_text: Toughness 9, DC 20 Sleight of Hand or Technology to escape.
description: Standard police-issue steel handcuffs.

name: Multi-tool
effects_text: Provides +1 circumstance bonus to Technology checks for repairs.
description: Compact tool with various functions (screwdriver, pliers, knife, etc.).

name: Night Vision Goggles
description: Allows vision in low-light and no-light conditions.

name: Rebreather
effects_text: Allows breathing underwater or in toxic atmospheres for up to 1 hour.
description: Filters air or provides a limited supply of breathable air.

name: Toolkit (Basic)
effects_text: Provides +2 circumstance bonus to Technology or relevant Expertise checks for its specific purpose.
description: A basic set of tools for a particular trade or skill (e.g., electronics, mechanics, first aid).
parameter_prompt: Specify toolkit type (e.g., Electronics, Mechanics, First Aid)

name: Binoculars
effects_text: Grants +5 circumstance bonus to Perception checks for distant visual observation.
description: Magnifies distant objects for easier viewing.

name: Camera
description: Can be digital or film, basic model.

name: Flashlight
effects_text: Provides illumination in a small area.
description: Standard portable light source.
dev_comment: DHH lists as 0 EP, but Feature 1 (Illumination) typically 1 EP. Made 1 EP for consistency if it's useful.

name: Gas Mask
effects_text: Protects against inhaled toxins for up to 1 hour.
description: Filters airborne toxins, providing immunity to inhaled gas effects.

name: Climbing Gear
effects_text: +5 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks for climbing.
description: Ropes, pitons, harness, etc.

name: First-Aid Kit
description: Contains basic medical supplies.

name: Brass Knuckles
description: Metal knuckle dusters, add to unarmed damage.

name: Club
description: A heavy stick or cudgel.

name: Knife
description: A bladed weapon, versatile for cutting or thrusting. EP cost includes feature for Crit 19-20.

name: Sword
description: A long-bladed weapon. EP cost includes feature for Crit 19-20.

name: Warhammer
description: A heavy, blunt-force weapon.

name: Spear
effects_text: Damage 3 (Strength-based, Piercing), Reach 1 (5 ft), Can be thrown (Range 25/50/100)
description: A pole weapon with a pointed tip, can be used in melee or thrown.

name: Bow
description: Standard bow and arrows.

name: Crossbow
description: Mechanical bow, easier to use but slower to reload than a regular bow. EP cost includes feature for Crit 19-20.

name: Light Pistol
description: A small caliber handgun.

name: Heavy Pistol
description: A large caliber handgun.

name: Rifle
description: A long-barreled firearm designed for accuracy at range.

name: Shotgun
effects_text: Ranged Damage 5 (Ballistic, limited to close range) or Ranged Damage 3 (Ballistic, short range)
description: Firearm that shoots a spread of pellets.

name: Submachine Gun (SMG)
description: Compact automatic firearm.
dev_comment: DHH cost 9 EP. Built: Dmg 4 (8EP) + Multiattack (+4EP) = 12 EP. Using DHH book cost.

name: Assault Rifle
description: Military-style automatic rifle.
dev_comment: DHH cost 11 EP. Built: Dmg 5 (10EP) + Multiattack (+5EP) = 15 EP. Using DHH book cost.

name: Sniper Rifle
description: Rifle designed for long-range precision shooting. EP cost includes feature for Crit 19-20.

name: Grenade (Fragmentation)
description: Explosive device that scatters shrapnel over an area.
dev_comment: DHH lists as Ranged Area Damage 5 for 15 EP. Built: Dmg 5 (5EP) + Ranged (+5EP) + Burst Area (+5EP) = 15 EP. This matches.

name: Grenade (Smoke)
description: Creates a cloud of smoke to obscure vision.
dev_comment: DHH lists as 3 EP. This often means the Concealment is less potent or has flaws. For 3 EP, suggests Concealment 1 (2EP for effect) + Cloud Area (1 rank for +1EP total).

name: Rocket Launcher (RPG)
description: Shoulder-fired anti-armor weapon. This is a lighter equipment version.
dev_comment: DHH RPG (Damage 8, Burst Area, Penetrating 4) costs 28 EP, likely a Device. This is Ranged Dmg 6, Burst Area (6+6+6=18 EP).

name: Flamethrower
description: Projects a stream of burning fuel.
dev_comment: DHH lists: Damage 5, Line Area, Secondary Effect. Built: Dmg 5 (5EP) + Line Area (+5EP) + Secondary Effect (+5EP) = 15 EP. This matches.

name: Leather Jacket (Armor)
description: Basic protection, like a heavy leather jacket.

name: Kevlar Vest (Armor)
description: Bulletproof vest, concealable under clothing. Cost includes Subtle feature.

name: Full Plate (Armor)
description: Heavy, articulated metal plate armor. Noticeable.

name: Small Shield
description: A small buckler or similar shield.

name: Large Shield
description: A medium or large shield providing substantial protection.
